name: Stone Flood Ad-Free
description:
Stone Flood is a simple, addictive and easy to play puzzle game for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

The goal of the game is to flood the board with a single color! Be fast and keep your number of moves low in order to score high! Start from the lower left corner and expand an area of same-colored stones by choosing between the different colored stone buttons. Each level has individually calculated minimum time and steps to achieve.

Be prepared for:
• More than 300 Levels
• Random Games
• 3 Level Packs
• Obstacles on play field
• Game Center Support
• Craze Factor
